content: X-EKB MX Cable clamp Plastic cable clasp for use with collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX/DX nailers for easy handling UL listed, plenum rated Flame-retardant version available Easy cable insertion Virtually dust-free fastening Applications Fastening multiple electrical cables flat on the working surface Typical spacing between cable clasps ranges from 50-100 cm â€“ load and cable stiffness must be taken into account For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Cable Fastenings, Conduit Fastening For use with (tools): BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 3 Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel Technical Data | Application | Cable Fastenings, Conduit Fastening | Material | Polyamide (PA) | For use with (tools) | BX 3, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6, GX 3 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | CSTB, ETA, UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 285712 - Cable clasp X-EKB 4 MX - Package Size 100 pc - 285713 - Cable clasp X-EKB 8 MX - Package Size 100 pc
